description: MainActivity for an Android app, implementing UI actions for importing models, selecting videos, and starting processing tasks related to speech-to-text transcription.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity is the central entry point of the Android app, managing UI components and user interactions for model importing, video selection, and processing initiation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and initiates a check to verify if a valid model is already loaded.

methods.name: showModelPicker
methods.description: Launches an intent to select a model file or directory, with fallback options if the primary method is unavailable.

methods.name: onActivityResult
methods.description: Handles results from file or directory selection activities, initiating model import upon success.

methods.name: takePersistableUriPermissionSafe
methods.description: Attempts to acquire persistent read permissions for a URI safely.

methods.name: importModelFromUri
methods.description: Performs asynchronous import of a model file from the selected URI, updating UI states accordingly.

methods.name: addStatus
methods.description: Adds status messages to the UI list view.

methods.name: updateStartButtonState
methods.description: Enables or disables the start processing button based on current selections.
